title:
I live in surf city and pay for trash pick up. In order to use the trash disposal site in surf city for large objects I need a Pender county sticker. how do I get this sticker.

Thanks

John Gallagher

770-789-6441
text: Here's a link to the answer to your question. http://www.myreporter.com/2016/12/how-can-i-get-a-sticker-that-allows-me-to-use-the-trash-disposal-site-in-surf-city/
